short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'Save Code' button to directly save the content of a codebox to a file. Adjusts to many file extensions automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'Save Code' button to directly save the content of a codebox to a file. Adjusts to many file extensions automatically. The button is designed to blend in with ChatGPT's design and is therefore unintrusive.
